title: Binance to Buy FTX in Megadeal of Crypto Exchanges
description: Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange, said it had reached a deal to buy FTX, amid fears the industry could enter another meltdown.
dc:creator: David Yaffe-Bellany and Erin Griffith
media:description: Changpeng Zhao, founder and chief executive of Binance. “This afternoon, FTX asked for our help,” Mr. Zhao said on Twitter on Tuesday.
